name: AmbidextrousRobot
0:
”Alexa, start Ambidextrous Robot”
”Start a new game”
”My guess is jump, wave, punch”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ambidextrous robot
des: Ambidextrous Robot is a memory game which is similar to the Simon game. This game can definitely help anyone challenge their memory. Ambid (the Robot's name) will show you certain movements, and then you say them in the right order. Each round the pattern gets longer.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
